data.description: [April Wang](https://aprilwang.me/) (2023 alum) joined ETH ZÃ¼rich as an Assistant Professor in Computer Science. Congratulations, Professor Wang!
[Mauli Pandey](https://pandeymauli.github.io/research/) (2023 alum) joined Google as a UX Researcher. Congratulations, Dr. Pandey!
Congratulations to Dr. Mauli Pandey and Dr. April Wang on their exceptional Ph.D. defenses!
Steve Oney was elected to [the VL/HCC steering committee](https://conferences.computer.org/VLHCC/SC-members.html)
Ashley Zhang presented at VL/HCC 2023 in Washington, D.C.!

data.description: We welcomed Jiacheng Zhang, a new UMSI Ph.D. student, to the spot group!
Congratulations to Dr. Rebecca Krosnick on her awesome Ph.D. defense!
[Dr. Rebecca Krosnick](https://public.websites.umich.edu/~rkros/) (2023 Ph.D. graduate) joined [Postman](https://www.postman.com/) as a software engineer! Congratulations, Dr. Krosnick!
[Lei Zhang](https://raynez.art/bio/) will join [NJIT Informatics](https://informatics.njit.edu/) as an Assistant Professor after a one-term postdoc at Princeton. Congratulations, Lei!
[Ashley](https://gezhangrp.com/) will be presenting her paper on representing code at scale at Learning @ Scale in Atlanta!
